content: Investments Savings SeedlyTV EP01 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 27 Mar 2019I just got out of NS, waiting to enter UNI. I really want to get started in investing but Iâ€™m afraid I will not have enough money to spend in UNI. What should I do? 1 answerAnswerBump0

God of WisdomAnswered on 27 Mar 2019Sounds like you're thinking of investing all your money.Only invest after setting aside your emergency expense and immediate needs. In this case, don't invest the money you have right now, but if you take a side hustle, try investing that instead of increasing your lifestyle.0 comments0
